Description:
Detects DNS queries for IP lookup services such as "api.ipify.org" originating from a non browser process.

Author: Brandon George (blog post), Thomas Patzke
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious DNS Query for IP Lookup Service APIs
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((query_name = 'www.ip.cn' or query_name = 'l2.io') and (query_name like '%api.2ip.ua%' or query_name like '%api.bigdatacloud.net%' or query_name like '%api.ipify.org%' or query_name like '%bot.whatismyipaddress.com%' or query_name like '%canireachthe.net%' or query_name like '%checkip.amazonaws.com%' or query_name like '%checkip.dyndns.org%' or query_name like '%curlmyip.com%' or query_name like '%db-ip.com%' or query_name like '%edns.ip-api.com%' or query_name like '%eth0.me%' or query_name like '%freegeoip.app%' or query_name like '%geoipy.com%' or query_name like '%getip.pro%' or query_name like '%icanhazip.com%' or query_name like '%ident.me%' or query_name like '%ifconfig.io%' or query_name like '%ifconfig.me%' or query_name like '%ip-api.com%' or query_name like '%ip.360.cn%' or query_name like '%ip.anysrc.net%' or query_name like '%ip.taobao.com%' or query_name like '%ip.tyk.nu%' or query_name like '%ipaddressworld.com%' or query_name like '%ipapi.co%' or query_name like '%ipconfig.io%' or query_name like '%ipecho.net%' or query_name like '%ipinfo.io%' or query_name like '%ipip.net%' or query_name like '%ipof.in%' or query_name like '%ipv4.icanhazip.com%' or query_name like '%ipv4bot.whatismyipaddress.com%' or query_name like '%ipv6-test.com%' or query_name like '%ipwho.is%' or query_name like '%jsonip.com%' or query_name like '%myexternalip.com%' or query_name like '%seeip.org%' or query_name like '%wgetip.com%' or query_name like '%whatismyip.akamai.com%' or query_name like '%whois.pconline.com.cn%' or query_name like '%wtfismyip.com%')) and  not (process_path like '%\vivaldi.exe' or (process_path = 'C:\Program Files\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe' or process_path = 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe') or (process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft\EdgeWebView\Application\%' and process_path like '%\WindowsApps\MicrosoftEdge.exe' and (process_path = 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft\Edge\Application\msedge.exe' or process_path = 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft\Edge\Application\msedge.exe')) or process_path like '%\maxthon.exe' or ((process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft\EdgeCore\%' or process_path like 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft\EdgeCore\%') and (process_path like '%\msedge.exe' or process_path like '%\msedgewebview2.exe')) or process_path like '%\opera.exe' or process_path like '%\safari.exe' or process_path like '%\seamonkey.exe' or process_path like '%\brave.exe' or (process_path = 'C:\Program Files\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe' or process_path = 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe') or (process_path = 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe' or process_path = 'C:\Program Files\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe') or process_path like '%\whale.exe'))
